plot outline: Fast-paced and fiery, this action drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of Dandu, a fearless and forthright young man, who never hesitates to fight for justice. Faced with crime, corruption and exploitation, he joins a group of warriors.
title: Dandu
plot: Fast-paced and fiery, this action drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of _Dandu_ (qv), a fearless and forthright young man, who never hesitates to fight for justice. Faced with crime, corruption and exploitation, he joins a group of warriors.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
